communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

All emails to or from any District email accounts between January 1, 2022 and the present that contain any of the following non-case-sensitive keywords.

- Satan
- Satanic

Please include CC'd and BCC'd messages. If any of the emails contain attachments, please include those attachments as well.

I ask that all fees be waived as I am a journalist and intend to use the requested records to publish articles in the public interest. If you choose to impose fees, I ask that you provide an explanation of the fees,.

If you choose to reject this request or redact portions of responsive documents, I ask that you cite the statutory exemptions and associated case law underlying your decision to withhold each portion from public review.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Nick DeMarchis
